short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you navigate between agents, and makes your life easier with useful features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
 -Adds buttons to the same products page on different agents
 -Adds option to see the price in your preferred currency
 -Adds option to X out the 'Risk Reminder' popups, which removes the risk reminders

 -Adds 'DIY Order' button to some agent pages that automatically fills out DIY order page

-Adds "View more" button next to some of the agents QC pictures, where you can view all recorded QC pictures

-Has built in spreadsheet(with 6.000+ products) which you can access from the extensions popup
-Built in image search across our entire spreadsheet (32.000+ images to match)

-Option to enable automatic redirect from platform pages to your preferred agent

-Supported agents
  •All China Buy (allchinabuy.com)
  •CNFans (cnfans.com)
  •Sugargoo (sugargoo.com)
  •HooBuy (hoobuy.com)
  •SuperBuy (superbuy.com)
  •and others...

*This extension uses an affiliate program that helps me out by rewriting the cart to use my affiliate codes, and rewrite the currently viewed products partnercode, this can easily be turned off in the extensions pop-up window.

*This extension uploads the items you view to an API, this than gets uploaded to a database. Anyone can view this database by clicking "Try our spreadsheet" on the extensions popup window.
